Package CZ2002

Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
CZ2002.ReservationManager
public class ReservationManager extends Object
This class is used to keep track of the ArrayList containing all the reservations and also contain functions to manage reservations
Since:
2021-11-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
Li Han

  • Method Details

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation​(Reservation r)
      Method to add reservations to the ArrayList, currentReservations
      Parameters:
      r - reservation to be added to the ArrayList

    • checkReservationValid

      public Reservation checkReservationValid​(boolean remove)
      Method to check if the reservation is still valid. If invalid, remove reservation.
      Parameters:
      remove - boolean to indicate if reservation should be removed after checking
      Returns:
      the reservation that has been removed or removed the last reservation as a dummy. If no reservations in ArrayList, return null.

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation​(Reservation r)
      Method to remove reservations from the ArrayList, currentReservations
      Parameters:
      r - the reservation to be removed

    • updateReservation

      public void updateReservation​(int contactNo)
      Method to update the reservation time of the reservation found in the ArrayList
      Parameters:
      contactNo - the contact number used to identify the respective reservation

    • getReservationList

      public ArrayList<Reservation> getReservationList()
      Method to return an ArrayList of reservations
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of reservations

    • printReservationList

      public void printReservationList()
      Method to print all the current reservations being made
